sourcesContent:
//import Vector from '../images/Vector.svg'; //import './index.css'; import React from 'react'; import Header from '../components/Header' import Main from '../components/Main' import Footer from '../components/Footer' import PopupWithForm from '../components/PopupWithForm' function App() { // //попап аватар // const [isEditAvatarPopupOpen, setIsEditAvatarPopupOpen] = React.useState(false) // function handleEditAvatarClick () { // setIsEditAvatarPopupOpen(true) // }; // //попап добавления карточки // const [isAddPlacePopupOpen, setIsAddPlacePopupOpen] = React.useState(false) // function handleAddPlaceClick () { // setIsAddPlacePopupOpen(true) // }; //попап профиль const [isEditProfilePopupOpen, setIsEditProfilePopupOpen] = React.useState(false) function handleEditProfileClick() { setIsEditProfilePopupOpen(true) } return ( < div className = "App" > < body className = "wrapper" > < div className = "page" > < Header / > < Main onEditProfile = { handleEditProfileClick } // onAddPlace = {handleAddPlaceClick} // onEditAvatar = {handleEditAvatarClick} /> < Footer / > < PopupWithForm isOpen = { isEditProfilePopupOpen } title = 'Редактировать профиль' title = 'Новое место' title = 'Обновить аватар' // isOpen={isEditAvatarPopupOpen} // isOpen={isAddPlacePopupOpen} / > { /*

{title}

*/ } < div className = "popup popup_type_add-card" > < div className = "popup__container" > < button type = "button" className = "popup__close" > < /button> < h2 className = "popup__text" > Новое место < /h2> < form action = "submit" className = "popup__form" name = "card" novalidate > < input type = "text" placeholder = "Название" className = "popup__input popup__input_type_card-name" name = "name" id = "cardname-input" minlength = "2" maxlength = "30" required / > < span className = "popup__error" id = "cardname-input-error" > < /span> < input type = "url" placeholder = "Ссылка на картинку" className = "popup__input popup__input_type_card-link" name = "link" id = "link-input" required / > < span className = "popup__error" id = "link-input-error" > < /span> < button type = "submit" disabled = "true" className = "popup__save" > Создать < /button> < /form> < /div> < /div> < div className = "popup popup_type_delete-confirm" > < div className = "popup__container popup__container_type_delete" > < button type = "button" className = "popup__close" > < /button> < form action = "submit" className = "popup__form popup__form_delete" name = "delete" novalidate > < h2 className = "popup__text popup__text_delete" > Вы уверены ? < /h2> < button type = "submit" className = "popup__save popup__save_confirmation" > Да < /button> < /form> < /div> < /div> < div className = "popup popup_type_avatar" > < div className = "popup__container " > < button type = "button" className = "popup__close" > < /button> < h2 className = "popup__text " > Обновить аватар < /h2> < form action = "submit" className = "popup__form " name = "avatarForm" novalidate > < input type = "url" placeholder = "Обновить аватар" className = "popup__input popup__input_type_avatar" name = "avatar" id = "editAvatar" required / > < span className = "popup__error" id = "editAvatar-error" > < /span> < button type = "submit" className = "popup__save " > Сохранить < /button> < /form> < /div> < /div> < template className = "card-template" > < div className = "card__elements" > < button className = "card__delete" > < /button> < img src = "#" className = "card__photo" alt = "" / > < div className = "card__text" > < h2 className = "card__tittle" > < /h2> < div className = "card__column" > < button type = "button" className = "card__like" > < /button> < span className = "card__like-count" > < /span> < /div> < /div> < /div> < /template> < /div> < /body> < /div> ); } export default App;
